title: WCAS MATH 212-0-81 Single Variable Calculus I

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Definition of a function, trigonometric, exponential, logarithmic and inverse functions, graphs, limits, continuity, derivative of a function, product, quotient and chain rule, linear approximation and differentials, mean value theorem, optimization problems, Newton's method.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
Enrollment only by permission of department. Not open for May registration.
Students eligible for enrollment may not have taken any prior calculus classes. Familiarity with pre-calculus is ok.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
